name: Compli-Cat
description:
Have you ever seen a cat running on two legs?

Why is the cat running?

Why is he wearing a robe?

Why are there so many odd things?

Welcome to a story where you play as a cat amidst the destruction of the world. A world full of pollution, carbon emissions, waste disposal……… and Zombies.

Compli-Cat…… As the name implies, is a game that presents a very difficult mechanic to play because it combines Hack n Slash with a touch of Endless Run. The combination of these two things makes for an interesting playing sensation. Welcome to Compli-Cat.

Made by:

  1. Alexius Andrianno Alfa Renanta (designer)
  2. Isya Almanda Bethrandria (programmer)
  3. Sindoro Chaidar Muzaki Asysyahid (artist)
  4. Narendra Dhafa Ilyaza (artist)
